Class: FoursquareApi

FoursquareApi

Stores the Foursquare API credentials and a number of methods to request the information about cateogories and venues using AJAX calls.

Constructor

new FoursquareApi()

Source:
  • viewmodel.js, line 106

Methods

getCategories(callback) → {object}

Send a request to the Foursquare API to retrieve all the parent categories available. This is only done once per session https://developer.foursquare.com/docs/venues/categories
Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback FoursquareApi~populateCategoriesFilters The callback that handles the response
Source:
  • viewmodel.js, line 140
Returns:
request - The request response
Type
object

getVenues(formattedCoordinates, filters, limit, callback)

Request the venues within the categories stored using the getCategories method.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
formattedCoordinates string Coordinates for prepared for the API request
filters array Categories used to restrit de data
limit int Number of results to retrieve (max 50)
callback FoursquareApi~populateInterestPoints The callback that handles the response
Source:
  • viewmodel.js, line 188

getVenuesData(requestUrl, category, callback) → {object}

Request the venues data.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
requestUrl string Coordinates for prepared for the API request
category array Category used to restrit de data
callback FoursquareApi~populateInterestPoints The callback that handles the response
Source:
  • viewmodel.js, line 216
Returns:
request - The request response
Type
object

setRequest(where, categoryIdopt, resultsLimitopt) → {string}

Prepares an AJAX request using the credentials clientId, clientSecret and referenceDate. Reference link https://developer.foursquare.com/start
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
where string The coordinates of the location to search where we want to look for venues
categoryId int <optional>
 Optional: the category used to filter the results if no category is specified it won't be used to request the data
resultsLimit int <optional>
 Optional: the number of results we want to receive
Source:
  • viewmodel.js, line 119
Returns:
baseUrl + query - The URL used for the AJAX request
Type
string

Callback used by FoursquareApi.getCategories.

Name Type Description
The object categories of Foursquare

(private) populateInterestPoints(response, category)

Callback used by FoursquareApi.getVenues. The method will stored the interest points (here venues) and updates the dataLoad controller.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
response object The data and status of the performed AJAX called
category object The category of the venues group obtained
